cons: Cayenne peppers may help improve your digestive health and reduce your risk of stomach ulcers.
description: The pepper also contains vitamin C, vitamin B6, vitamin E, potassium, manganese and flavonoids – which provides its powerful antioxidantproperties.

Cayenne has the ability to ease upset stomach, ulcers, sore throats, spasmodic and irritating coughs, and diarrhea.Cayenne pepper helps reduce atherosclerosis, encourages fibrinolytic activity, and prevents factors that lead to the formation of blood clots, all of which can help reduce the chances of a heart attack or stroke.
Cayenne stimulates the production of saliva, an important component of digestion and maintaining optimal oral health.
Cayenne is an excellent preservative and has been used traditionally to prevent food contamination from bacteria.
